def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x,y,z in get3idxs(idxs):
        check_xyz_triangle = is_triangle([x,y,z], ctx)
        check_x_left = is_left(x, [y,z], ctx)
        check_y_bottom = is_bottom(y, [x,z], ctx)
        check_xy_same_size = same_size([x,y], ctx)
        check_xy_darker = is_darker(x, y, ctx)
        check_z_right = is_right(z, [x,y], ctx)
        check_z_larger_xy = is_larger(z, [x,y], ctx)
        check_z_really_dark = is_dark(z, ctx) and not is_grey(z, ctx)
        if (
            check_xyz_triangle
            and check_x_left
            and check_y_bottom
            and check_xy_same_size
            and check_xy_darker
            and check_z_right
            and check_z_larger_xy
            and check_z_really_dark
        ):
            results.append([x,y,z])
    return results
state = turn(state)
